room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Had a great time, escaped in 51 minutes. The guys running it were very cool and accommodating. We will definitely be back to try the rest of the rooms. Keep up the good work boys!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We came here with my family and had such a great time! The staff were very helpful and friendly! Andy was a very awesome host!! We will definitely be returning to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: A great experience! I have done 3 rooms here and all have been super fun. Challenging but not frustratingly so.  Joe was an excellent game master!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Breakout is always a fun time for our family! Great staff, very helpful. Can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My family and I did the Do Not Disturb game at Breakout North Hills.  It was really fun!  The game masters at Breakout are really enthusiastic and add to the excitement. The game itself was interesting, challenging, and logically set up.  It had many interesting and different puzzles -- you had to use several senses to problem-solve.  No spoilers, but I know that you will enjoy this game!
